org.opendaylight.controller.statisticsmanager.internal

Class StatisticsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.statisticsmanager.internal.StatisticsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>, IListenInventoryUpdates, IPluginOutReadService, IReadServiceListener, IStatisticsManager

    public class StatisticsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStatisticsManager, IReadServiceListener, IListenInventoryUpdates, ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    The class caches latest network nodes statistics as notified by reader services and provides API to retrieve them.

      void descriptionStatisticsUpdated(Node node, NodeDescription nodeDescription)
      Notifies the hardware view of node description changes
      void entryCreated(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.String cacheName, boolean originLocal)
      Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
      void entryDeleted(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.String cacheName, boolean originLocal)
      Called anytime a given key is removed from the ConcurrentHashMap we are listening to.
      void entryUpdated(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object new_value, java.lang.String cacheName, boolean originLocal)
      Called anytime a given entry is updated
      java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlows(Node node)
      Return all the statistics for all the flows present on the specified node in the current container context.
      java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlowsNoCache(Node node)
      Same as the getFlows method.
      int getFlowsNumber(Node node)
      Returns the number of flows installed on the switch in the current container context If the context is the default container, the returned value is the number of all the flows installed on the switch regardless of the container they belong to
      java.util.Map<Node,java.util.List<FlowOnNode>> getFlowStatisticsForFlowList(java.util.List<FlowEntry> flowList)
      Returns the statistics for the flows specified in the list

      Returns the statistics for all the node connector present on the specified network node
      NodeConnectorStatistics getNodeConnectorStatistics(NodeConnector nodeConnector)
      Returns the statistics for the specified node connector as it was retrieved by the protocol plugin component and cached by statistics manager.
      NodeDescription getNodeDescription(Node node)

      Returns the statistics for all the tables of the node

      Returns the statistics for the specified table of the node

      • getFlows

        public java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlows(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IStatisticsManager
        Return all the statistics for all the flows present on the specified node in the current container context. If the context is the default container, the returned statistics are for all the flows installed on the node, regardless of the container they belong to
        Specified by:
        getFlows in interface IStatisticsManager
        Parameters:
        node - The network node
        Returns:
        List of flows installed on the network node. Null if specified node is null. Empty list if node/stat is not present.

      • getFlowsNoCache

        public java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlowsNoCache(Node node)
        Same as the getFlows method. The only difference is that this method does not return cached flows. It will always make a request to the node to get all the flows for that node. If the request times out or gets an error, we revert to getting the cached flows.
        Specified by:
        getFlowsNoCache in interface IStatisticsManager
        Returns:
        List of flows installed on the network node.
        See Also:
        IStatisticsManager.getFlows(org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node)

      • getFlowStatisticsForFlowList

        public java.util.Map<Node,java.util.List<FlowOnNode>> getFlowStatisticsForFlowList(java.util.List<FlowEntry> flowList)
        Description copied from interface: IStatisticsManager
        Returns the statistics for the flows specified in the list
        Specified by:
        getFlowStatisticsForFlowList in interface IStatisticsManager
        Returns:
        A map of flows per node installed on that node, empty map if flows is null/empty.

      • getFlowsNumber

        public int getFlowsNumber(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IStatisticsManager
        Returns the number of flows installed on the switch in the current container context If the context is the default container, the returned value is the number of all the flows installed on the switch regardless of the container they belong to
        Specified by:
        getFlowsNumber in interface IStatisticsManager
        Returns:
        number of flows on specified node or (-1) if node was not found

      • getNodeDescription

        public NodeDescription getNodeDescription(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IStatisticsManager

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • entryCreated

        public void entryCreated(java.lang.Object key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
        Specified by:
        entryCreated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry just created
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • entryUpdated

        public void entryUpdated(java.lang.Object key,
                java.lang.Object new_value,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Called anytime a given entry is updated
        Specified by:
        entryUpdated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry modified
        new_value - the new value the key will have
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • entryDeleted

        public void entryDeleted(java.lang.Object key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Called anytime a given key is removed from the ConcurrentHashMap we are listening to.
        Specified by:
        entryDeleted in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the entry removed
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node
